korean: 여기 가까워요. 이 길로 쭉 직진하시면 노란색 큰 간판이 있는데  거기 바로 옆 골목이에요.
english: It's very close. Go straight this way and you'll see a big yellow sign. The restaurant is in the alley right next to it.

english: How far do you live from Cambodia International Airport?

english: Our company is in financial pressure at the moment so we don't know for sure how many new employees we can recruit.
